name: Deeper Inside
description:
An astronaut arrives to an strange planet looking for some water to use it as fuel for his spaceship. Soon he will find out a world full of mystery and adventure. 

- Controls.

*This is a game for two people.

The game is in develompment process.  This is a concept test and its not the final version of the game. Game created for the Jam MetroidVania Month 8.

    • Kevin Lagos
